caption.p: (a) First voltammetric background cycles of two graphene electrodes ( A ≈ 0.3 cm 2) and a glassy carbon disk electrode ( A = 0.07 cm 2) in 12CE, Pt-mesh auxiliary electrode, v = 50 mV s –1, E start = 0.7 V, initial sweep direction indicated by arrows. (b) Raman spectra of the graphene electrodes after the cyclic voltammetric background cycles shown in (a). (c) Successive cyclic voltammetric background cycles of a graphene electrode ( A ≈ 0.3 cm 2) in a 12CE, Pt-mesh auxiliary electrode, v = 50 mV s –1, E start = 0.7 V, initial sweep direction negative. Note that the third cathodic cycle (green) is fully overlaid by the fourth cycle (red).
